snippet.title: The Bridge Curse : Road to Salvation - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The return of the campus haunting hours
First look at The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation, a new horror game project from Softstar Entertainment.

The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation is an adaptation of a 2020 horror film, The Bridge Curse. Out of 10 college horror tales from Taiwan, The Bridge Curse is one of the well-known supernatural incidents in Tunghu University. According to the legend, there’s a cursed bridge on the campus of Tunghu University.
The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation is coming to Steam in 2022.
A new demo will be ready for Steam Next Fest this February.
Make sure to check it out and leave feedback!



Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1611430/_/
FB : https://www.facebook.com/TbcRts/
IG :https://www.instagram.com/tbc_rts/
Twitter :https://twitter.com/TbcRts
E-mail: tbc_rts@softstar.com.tw
